statements: DELETE FROM cost_savings_analysis WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND vehicle_type = 'SUV';
DELETE FROM cost_savings_analysis WHERE fuel_consumption > 25 AND electricity_cost < 50;
DELETE FROM fuel_powered_vehicles WHERE vehicle_name = 'Toyota Camry';
DELETE FROM fuel_powered_vehicles WHERE model_year < 2015 AND gas_mileage_mpg > 25;
DELETE FROM savings WHERE savings_amount > 1000 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM trips WHERE trip_cost > 500 AND vehicle_id = 3;
DELETE FROM fuel_powered_vehicles WHERE year < 2015 AND fuel_type = 'Diesel';
DELETE FROM maintenance_costs WHERE vehicle_id = 5 AND maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
